availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married Calista Covington Mansfield in 1832. Father of Elijah Mansfield and Washington Mansfield.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 31. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 21. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Fillmore, p. 39. Kentucky, County Marriages, 1783-1965, Ancestry, Logan County, 1832.
